subject: Baseball
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: The Texas Rangers left-hander Derek Holland agreed to a new five-year contract through 2016 that will pay him a total of $28.5 million and includes club options for two more seasons after that.
snippet: The Texas Rangers left-hander Derek Holland agreed to a new five-year contract through 2016 that will pay him a total of $28.5 million and includes club options for two more seasons after that.
